mapper.sql: t1.id as "id" ,t1.trade_code as "tradeCode" ,t1.account_trade_log_id as "accountTradeLogId" ,t1.amount as "amount" ,t1.currency as "currency" ,t1.app_user_id as "appUserId" ,t1.account_id as "accountId" ,t1.account_sub_type as "accountSubType" ,t1.account_sub_id as "accountSubId" ,t1.account_balance as "accountBalance" ,t1.account_type as "accountType" ,t1.other_account_type as "otherAccountType" ,t1.other_account_id as "otherAccountId" ,t1.other_account_sub_type as "otherAccountSubType" ,t1.other_account_sub_id as "otherAccountSubId" ,t1.out_order_no as "outOrderNo" ,t1.out_trade_date as "outTradeDate" ,t1.trade_agency as "tradeAgency" ,t1.trade_desc as "tradeDesc" ,t1.data as "data" ,t1.is_correct as "isCorrect" ,t1.type as "type" ,t1.is_red as "isRed" ,t1.del_flag as "delFlag" ,t1.fin_voucher_id as "finVoucherId" ,t1.create_id as "createId" ,t1.create_ip as "createIp" ,t1.date_created as "dateCreated" ,t1.date_updated as "dateUpdated" ,t1.memo as "memo" ,t1.bi_update_ts as "biUpdateTs"
mapper.select:
select
from account_log t1 where t1.id = #{id}

select
from account_log t1 where 1=1
order by t1.date_created desc

select
from account_log t1 where 1=1
order by t1.date_created desc
